titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to rehabilitate and preserve the Delaware Canal and the Lehigh Canal in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania in accordance with the provisions of the Historic Sites Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Field Hearings Held in Yardley, Pennsylvania.

bill.summary: 2/17/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to rehabilitate and preserve the Delaware and Lehigh Canal, Pennsylvania, in accordance with the Historic Sites Act. Authorizes appropriations.
